description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Sanctuary Cove, Australia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Gold Coast Five-Star Sanctuary Cove Retreat with One-Acre Lagoon Beach Pool
hotels.description: Fall in love with the Gold Coast's laidback atmosphere at InterContinental Sanctuary Cove Resort, an IHG Hotel. This idyllic hideaway is superbly set on 4.2-hectares of tropical gardens and boasts a sprawling one-acre lagoon pool and four exquisite dining destinations. The world-renowned Gold Coast theme parks are just a 10-minute drive away, and guests can also enjoy easy access to the tranquil Marine Village or critically-acclaimed golf course.

seo.title: Hotel a Sanctuary Cove - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Sanctuary Cove, Australia con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
